recommendations: Technical Director - Infrastructure Architect at Charles Schwab & Co.
March 1, 2009, Mitchell reported directly to Denise

Denise is one of the top 3 managers I have had the privilege of working with in my extensive career.  She has strong management skills, compassion for her people, sets high expectations, and supports her teams.  She is respected and admired by the people who work for her and with her. Denise steps in to new roles quickly and comes up to speed faster than anyone else I've seen.  Her ability to absorb large amounts of information and distill that to the critical essence is superb.  She constantly impresses people with her capabilities.  I still have not figured out how she does it all so well (juggling a major career and job with family life and still having time to bake).  I am privileged to be able to call Denise my friend.
